alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 7:36PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla, southeastern Liberty and northeastern Franklin Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 736 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 23 miles west of Crawfordville to 14 miles northeast of Carrabelle. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Crawfordville, Woodville, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Newport, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Shadeville, Wakulla Springs, Panacea, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Medart, Buckhorn, Bethel, Liveoak Island, Curtis Mill, Alligator Point and Saint Teresa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
